survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with In-Office Fitness Facilities Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the availability, quality, and usage of in-office fitness facilities to improve workplace wellness initiatives.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the in-office fitness facilities?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear frequency categorization. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the in-office fitness facilities?

questions.question_text: Which of the following in-office fitness amenities do you use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select checkbox format. Include an 'Other' option if open-ended responses are valuable.

script.question_text: Which of the following in-office fitness amenities do you use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use the in-office fitness facilities more often?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.

script.question_text: What improvements would encourage you to use the in-office fitness facilities more often?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the cleanliness and maintenance of the fitness facilities?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Randomize scale order to avoid bias.

questions.question_text: Would you participate in employer-sponsored wellness challenges tied to facility usage?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice with a neutral option. Consider follow-up questions for 'Maybe' responses.
